body_html: Ah, thanks! I was looking for "padding" in the docs (similar to the organization in torch.nn) and just see now that the pad function is under "Vision Functions". That would solve the problem, sorry about that!
body_text: Ah, thanks! I was looking for "padding" in the docs (similar to the organization in torch.nn) and just see now that the pad function is under "Vision Functions". That would solve the problem, sorry about that!
body:
Ah, thanks! I was looking for "padding" in the docs (similar to the organization in torch.nn) and just see now that the `pad` function is under "Vision Functions". That would solve the problem, sorry about that!
